content: We have some very long lines which make grepping quite annoying, like the macro at the end of parser/src/syntax_kind/generated.rs. I wonder if we could format them more nicely, maybe by producing a string instead of using quote!.

Should totally do that. We already have smth similar here:

https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/blob/7c94f1cb5e86739864871dc56fcbd7a6de116315/xtask/src/codegen/gen_syntax.rs#L253
